rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer designed in Mediterranean style incorporating natural stone finishes and wood accents.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living space that seamlessly connects to the dining area, featuring Mediterranean color palette and decorative arches.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated within the living area with a semi-open kitchen, promoting family interaction.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Mediterranean kitchen with high-end appliances, ample storage and an island workspace. Vastu-compliant layout ensuring proper ventilation and energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom located in the north-east direction to enhance prosperity and well-being, decorated in luxury Mediterranean style with ample natural light.

rooms.name: Bathroom (attached to Master Bedroom)
rooms.description: Luxurious en-suite bathroom featuring Vastu-compliant design for harmony and privacy.
